data.actual_result: Discord CPU usage jumps to 70-90% and entire computer begins lagging.
data.expected_result: Video calls and scharing your screen won't cause large CPU usage and lag.
data.short_description: Video Chat and Screen Share Overload CPU
data.steps_to_repro: - Start a video call with your best friend. - Open your OS's CPU monitoring program. - Discord Canary/Discord Canary Helper will be using around 40-50% of your CPU. - Start sharing your screen. - Discord will now be using up to 80% of your CPU, and your computer will begin lagging.
